statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null; stats=$(git log --since="$(date +%Y-%m-%d) 00:00:00" --until="$(date +%Y-%m-%d) 23:59:59" --pretty=format: --numstat 2>/dev/null | awk '{added+=$1; removed+=$2} END {printf "+%d/-%d", added+0, removed+0}'); commits=$(git log --since="$(date +%Y-%m-%d) 00:00:00" --until="$(date +%Y-%m-%d) 23:59:59" --oneline 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); printf "\033[33m$stats\033[0m \033[32m+${commits}\033[0m"
